39  // The Server class contains information on current server connections :
40  // the different threads, runnables, IPC objects, etc.
41  class Server
42  {
43  private:
44  struct ConnectionInfo
45  {
46  IPC* ipc;
47  DepthSense::Utils::Threading::Thread* st;
48  DepthSense::Utils::Threading::Thread* dt;
49  ServerRunnable* s;
50  Demultiplexer* d;
51  };
52 
53  private:
55  Server();

58  ~Server();

114  };
